legislation: Early Removal of Fixed-Term Prisoners (Amendment of Eligibility Period) Order 2008 Early Removal of Short-Term and Long-Term Prisoners (Amendment of Requisite Period) Order 2008
description: Letter dated 02/04/2008 from Lord Hunt of Kings Heath to Baroness Howe of Ildecote regarding the gender split amongst foreign national prisoners currently detained in prison. 2 p.
